Steps.StepString: Crafted a URL that included a redirection to an attacker-controlled website to test for an Open Redirect vulnerability
Navigated to modified URL, which redirected to attacker-controlled website, confirming the presence of Open Redirect vulnerability
Created a phishing page mimicking the appearance of the original web application and hosted on attacker-controlled website
Crafted malicious URL that redirected users to phishing page and distributed the URL to unsuspecting users
Captured user login credentials with phishing attacks and gained unauthorized access to their accounts
Found flag for Web Exploitation challenge in one of the compromised accounts
